name: Torment (itch) (BigDonnyCal)
description:
This game was made and developed by Cal Hilton.

It uses some external assets from other creators being:

Tutorials to make the game and the assets Paddle.psd and Treadmill.psd by Darrenlloyd Gent. Art Dystopia font is from dafont.com (https://www.dafont.com/artdystopia.font). Some sound effects, being CoinPickUp.mp3, Footstep.mp3, LadderFootstep.mp3, PlatformFootstep.mp3, OpenDoor.mp3 by Zapsplat.com (https://www.zapsplat.com/sound-effect-category/game-sounds/)
